entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Pilot Mound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:26 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pilot Mound 9:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -8.9°C
Wind: NE 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this evening then periods of snow. Blowing snow late this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
